title: Sisters at the Edge of the World
description: When Morragh speaks to another person for the very first time, she has no idea that he is an invader in her land.What she does next constitutes a huge betrayal of her people, threatening her closest relationships and even her way of life itself.As the conflict between the Caledonian tribes and the Roman Sons of Mars intensifies, can she use her high status in the community to lessen the coming death toll or even prevent outright war?Set in 1st century Northern Scotland, SISTERS AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD is a story of chosen sisters, fierce warriors, divided loyalties and, ultimately, love."Ethereal and spellbinding..." Historical Novel Society
author: Ailish Sinclair
